com.example.descom
Class DescomApplication

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.Application
      com.example.descom.DescomApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.addon.sqlcontainer.query.QueryDelegate.RowIdChangeListener, com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeListener, com.vaadin.terminal.Terminal.ErrorListener, com.vaadin.terminal.URIHandler, com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, java.io.Serializable
public class DescomApplication
extends com.vaadin.Application
implements com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeListener, com.vaadin.addon.sqlcontainer.query.QueryDelegate.RowIdChangeListener

Main class serving as core. Used Vaadin Framework with HSQLDB. Add-ons: FilterTable version 0.8.0 Popupbutton version 1.0.0

Author:
m4gik
See Also:
Serialized Form
